meanings: childish, immature, infantile, juvenile, babyish, (formal) puerile

vlive.korean: 너무 유치한 거 아니냐? Isn't it too childish? 듣기 View video BTS : 오늘은 안 늦졌어요~
약간 확실히 좀 유치한 기분이... It was a bit cheesy. 듣기 View video EXO : SUHO ONLINE FANMEETING "O2asis"
"이런 생각 유치한 건가요?" "Am I being immature?" 듣기 View video DAY6 : 토요일밤 필레이리스트☆
재윤 씨는 평소에 좀 유치한 적이 있었나요? but are you normally childish? 듣기 View video SF9 : [빈,us] 독일🍀
이건 또 무슨 유치한 장난 질이냐? What kind of corny joke is this? 듣기 View video 브릿지TV (BRIDGE TV) : <사랑, 시간에 머물다> EP3-1
vlive.english: What kind of corny joke is this?

examples.korean: a silly sense of humour 발음듣기 유치한 유머 감각 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a silly sense of humour 발음

examples.korean: You are a real fibbler. 발음듣기 너는 정말 유치한 거짓말쟁이야. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: You are a real fibbler. 발음

examples.korean: Not every age is fit for childish sports. (Titus Maccius Plautus) 발음듣기 모든 나이가 다 유치한 스포츠에 적합하지는 않다. (플라우투스, 스포츠명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Not every age is fit for childish sports. (Titus Maccius Plautus) 발음

examples.korean: He always wants to be the one making people laugh. He enjoys being goofy and silly. 발음듣기 그는 언제나 사람들을 웃게 만드는 사람이길 원해. 엉뚱하고 유치한 걸 즐겨. DARAKWON
examples.english: He always wants to be the one making people laugh. He enjoys being goofy and silly. 발음

examples.korean: Sometimes when you look back on a situation, you realize it wasn't all you thought it was. A beautiful girl walked into your life. You fell in love. Or did you? Maybe it was only a childish infatuation, or maybe just a brief moment of vanity. (Henry Bromel) 발음듣기 때때로 어떤 상황을 돌이켜 볼 때, 네가 생각했던 게 다가 아니란 걸 깨닫게 되지. 아름다운 소녀가 네 인생에 걸어 들어 왔지. 넌 사랑에 빠졌지. 아니, 그랬나? 아마도 그건 유치한 사랑의 열병이었거나 덧없는 한 순간일 뿐이었겠지. (헨리 브로멜, 사랑명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: Sometimes when you look back on a situation, you realize it wasn't all you thought it was. A beautiful girl walked into your life. You fell in love. Or did you? Maybe it was only a childish infatuation, or maybe just a brief moment of vanity. (Henry Bromel) 발음
